outcome_definition.clinical_standard: ILAE definition: sustained seizure freedom when patient is seizure-free for >1 year, OR has sporadic seizures separated by a period 3× the longest interval between seizures prior to treatment, whichever is longer.
outcome_definition.note: If your dataset uses a simple '12 months since last seizure' rule without the 3× interseizure-interval clause, then it is NOT ILAE-equivalent.
